lines.text:
[describing Jeremy]
Seething animal passions about to erupt through the pie crust of decorum.
Who is it?
I'm not sure, but his voice washed over me like a dark, powerful river.
Rub some compost in your face, straight boys love it.
Leo, you are a strawberry blond. You can't go out with an ash blonde. It's not right!
All relationships end, either one of you leaves or one of you dies.
women are complicated. I mean, men are kind of pathetic, but at least you know where you are.
Why do I have to have such a complicated sex life?
It's because you give off complicated vibrations. Simplify your vibrations, your sex life simplifies itself.

[after having sex]
I love being a woman, not because of you but because of me.

[finds a blindfolded naked man cuffed to her bed]
What the hell is this?
OH HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEAR GERALDINE, CONGRATULATIONS, YOU'RE SEVENTEEN!
My name is not Geraldine and it's not my birthday
Isn't it? This is 25 Shelldrake Avenue?
No this is 23 Shelldrake Avenue
Oh, how appallingly embarrassing of me, I'm an S&M-ogram, I must've gotten the wrong address
[embarrassed, under his breath]
oh no!
Wait... don't I know you?
God I hope not
[she unties blindfold, he recognizes her]
AHH!

[Reading from dust jacket]
"Margaret Thatcher put the C back in conservatism."
What else do you want? He's gorgeous, he's charming and he made breakfast.
I mean the man is on the rebound, you know from women in general. I mean, he wants me because I'm not a woman.
It seems a very good reason to want someone.
But it's a negative reason, Darren. He wants me for what I'm not, not for what I am.
Any good in bed?
Yeah, yeah, he was, but...

[interrupting]
Well then keep him.
Something terrible has happened and I need your support.
Not now Darren, I'm making lasagna.
